title: Recover Two-Factor Authentication
description: We are very sorry if you lost your codes. Please enter a recovery code to continue. Note that this will disable two-factor authentication for your account. You can enable it again in the settings.

events.unauthorized: Please make sure to log in first and then reset your two-factor authentication on its screen.
events.canLogInNow: Two-factor authentication has been disabled. You can log in now.
events.loggedIn: Two-factor authentication has been disabled. You are logged in now.
